items.question: How does the free trial work?
items.answer: You get 7 days free access to all Pro features. No credit card required. Cancel anytime before the trial ends and you won't be charged.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. If you upgrade, you'll be charged the prorated difference. If you downgrade, the credit applies to your next billing cycle.

items.question: What AI models do you support?
items.answer: We support OpenAI GPT-5 and GPT-4, Anthropic Claude 3.5, Google Gemini, and Llama 3.1. You can switch models anytime from your dashboard.

items.question: How is pricing calculated?
items.answer: Pricing is based on the number of messages per month. Each message (user input + bot response) counts as one message. Unused messages don't roll over.

items.question: Can I train the bot on my private documents?
items.answer: Absolutely. Upload PDFs, Word docs, spreadsheets, or paste text. You can also scrape your website automatically. All data is encrypted and never shared.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied. Just email us and we'll process your refund within 5 business days.

items.question: Is my data secure and GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Yes. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We're GDPR compliant and SOC 2 Type II certified. You can export or delete your data anytime.

items.question: Can I use my own OpenAI API key?
items.answer: On the Scale plan, yes. You can bring your own API keys for OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google to control costs directly.

items.question: What languages does the chatbot support?
items.answer: The chatbot can respond in 22 languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, and more. It auto-detects the user's language.

items.question: How do I embed the chatbot on my website?
items.answer: Copy a single line of JavaScript code from your dashboard and paste it before the closing </body> tag. That's it. Fully customizable styling available.
